Twisted Karen Matthews is living in agony from her 'black rotten teeth' after stuffing her face with junk food and sugary drinks while in jail. 
Karen - dubbed Britain's most hated mum - apparently guzzled crisps and chocolate while serving half her sentence for the fake kidnap of daughter Shannon. 
The former con is still gorging on greasy takeaways from chippies and her local McDonald's while she lives on benefits under a new name, The Sun reported. 
But she is allegedly too scared to go to the dentist. 
A source told The Sun: “Her teeth are in an absolutely shocking state – all black and decayed. 
“She desperately needs to get herself to a dentist before she’s got nothing left. But she’s terrified of dentists and won’t go. Read More Karen Matthews attacked with MUSHY PEAS by a disgusted mum as she left chippie Karen apparently guzzled crisps and chocolate while serving half her sentence for the fake kidnap (Photo: Daily Mirror) 
“But she’ll need to go before long because she’s in constant pain and swallows nearly as many ibuprofen pills as she does sweets to dull the pain.” 
The 41-year-old, who is still apparently protesting her innocence, shied away from meals at New Hall prison in West Yorkshire and Derbyshire’s Foston Hall jail over fears the food had been contaminated by vengeful lags. 
It comes two months after she revealed that people throw fireworks at her in the street when they learn her identity. Disgraced mum was jailed in January 2009 and freed in 2012 for faking Shannon's kidnap Cops found Sharon drugged and tethered in a relative's grubby flat (Photo: PA) 
Karen has begged for a surgical makeover so she can start to build a new life for herself. 
Back in December 2016, she told a friend: "I'd love plastic surgery so nobody recognises me." 
The disgraced mum was jailed in January 2009 and freed in 2012 for faking Shannon's kidnap, who was nine at the time, after cops found her drugged and tethered in a relative's grubby flat. Read More The Moorside's Sheridan Smith now 'friends for life' with character she plays in Karen Matthews drama Shamed Karen has been bombarded with death threats over the vile crime (Photo: Nigel Bennett) 
It later emerged that Karen had orchestrated the whole plot so she could bag the £50,000 reward money and split it with her accomplice Michael Donovan. 
Shamed Karen has been bombarded with death threats after new BBC drama retelling the story of Shannon's abduction aired last week. Like us on Facebook
